verb.description: (of an electronic device) emit a short low-pitched noise.
examples: a slot machine blooping in the corner
the company admitted it had blooped

verb.description: Hit (a ball) weakly or make (a hit) from a poorly hit fly ball landing just beyond the reach of the infielders.
examples: he blooped a single over the fielder in the third inning

noun.description: A short low-pitched noise emitted by an electronic device.

examples: seven hits which were bloops for the most part
